data.title: Lancashire OnLine Parish Clerk Project
data.text:
Marriages at St John the Baptist

in the Parish of Pilling

Marriages recorded in the Register for 1892 - 1900

Marriage: 3 Feb 1892 St John the Baptist, Pilling, Lancs.

Leonard Billington - 23, Farmer, B. A.chelor, Pilling

Elizabeth Jenkinson - 24, Spinster, Pilling

Groom's Father: Thomas Billington, Farmer

Bride's Father: Adam Jenkinson, deceased, Farmer

Witness: Adam Jenkinson; Ellen Jenkinson

Married by Banns by: Alfred Creswick Oliver B. A. Curate of Pilling

Register: Marriages 1892 - 1900, Page 1, Entry 1

Source: LDS Film 1470931
